briefTitle: Immunogenicity and Safety of Meningococcal ACWY Conjugate Vaccine in Healthy Subjects From 2 to 75 Years of Age in India
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multi-center, Open-label Study to Evaluate Immunogenicity and Safety of Novartis Meningococcal ACWY Conjugate Vaccine (MenACWY-CRM) in Healthy Subjects From 2 to 75 Years of Age in India.
summary: This study will evaluate the immunogenicity of a single injection of Novartis Meningococcal ACWY conjugate vaccine in healthy subjects from the age of 2 years and above in India.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentages of Subjects With Human Serum Bactericidal Assay (hSBA) Seroresponse Against N.Meningitidis Serogroup A.
